articles.author: Mikhaila Friel
articles.title: Prince Philip, who just died at 99, once said he 'couldn't imagine anything worse' than reaching 100 - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Buckingham Palace said the Queen's husband "passed away peacefully" at Windsor Castle on Friday morning.
articles.content:
Prince Philip, the Duke of Edinburgh, died Friday at the age of 99.
"It is with deep sorrow that Her Majesty The Queen announces the death of her beloved husband, His Royal Highness The Prince Phili… [+1798 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk's brain chip company Neuralink released video of monkey playing video games with its mind - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Musk has boasted about getting monkeys to play video games through a brain chip before, but this is the first time Neuralink has shown it in action.
articles.content:
Elon Musk finally got to show off his monkey.
Neuralink, a company founded by Musk that is developing AI-powered microchips to go in people's brains, released a video on Thursday, appearing to show … [+3009 chars]
